import React from 'react' import { SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react'; import data from '../data'; export default function Product(props) { const {product} =props return ( <> {data.products.map(product=>{
{product.discountPercentage}% OFF
{product.name}
Available in - {product.size}

$ {product.offerPrice}
$ {product.regularPrice}

 })} ) }
